'''Beta 1.21.10.24''' (ChromeOS, Android) or '''Preview 1.21.10.24''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox, PlayStation) is the fifth beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.20]]{{efn|Bedrock Edition 1.21.10 is not a version of the game and its betas are instead part of [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.20|1.21.20]]<ref>https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/27935763028237-Minecraft-Beta-Preview-1-21-20-21</ref>}}, released on June 19, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/27700301696653|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.21.10.24|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=June 19, 2024}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.10.24 Preview
|;previous
|182541|Structures do not spawn mobs after a world is saved and reloaded.
|otherissuescount=4}}
'''Others'''
* Polished andesite slabs can once again be crafted using andesite in the stonecutter.
* Fixed a bug where players with a freshly installed Minecraft need to restart before being able to see Realms Stories.
* Using tridents with Riptide enchantment now correctly cancels fall damage reduction from wind charge.
* Fixed an issue with certain item components that were no longer functioning for remotely connected players.</onlyinclude>
